mapper.sql:
ph.id AS "id", u.name AS 'name', u.id AS 'userid', DATE_FORMAT(ph.workTime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS 'workTime',
CONCAT('星期',DATE_FORMAT(ph.workTime, '%w')) AS 'weekName', pi.projectName AS 'projectname', ph.taskstarttime AS "taskStartTime", ph.taskendtime AS "taskEndTime", ph.workDesc AS 'workDesc', MAX(CASE WHEN ph.workHoursType = 'workingDay' THEN ph.realHours ELSE 0 END) AS 'workLoad', MAX(CASE WHEN ph.workHoursType != 'workingDay' THEN ph.realHours ELSE 0 END) AS 'overTime', IF (ph.realHours > 0 AND (ph.workHoursType = 'workingDayOvertime' OR ph.workHoursType = 'holidayOvertime'),'是','否') AS 'ifOverTime'
LEFT JOIN prho_project_info pi ON pi.id = ph.project_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ph.staff
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM prho_project_hours ph
AND u.id = #{userid}
and DATE_FORMAT(ph.taskstarttime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{starttime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(ph.taskendtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ph.workTime, '%Y-%m-%d')
